sentences.en: All that sun, water and chlorine made your hair dry, rough, brittle, and frizzy?
sentences.cn: 所有那些阳光 、 水和氯使你的头发干燥 、 粗糙 、 脆弱以及卷曲?

sentences.en: Carol's hair had a slightly frizzy perm.
sentences.cn: 卡萝尔一头略鬈的烫发。

sentences.en: First, the whole system was decomposed into several subsystems by adopting frizzy k - means cluster.
sentences.cn: 首先, 采用动态聚类方法,将整个系统分解为几个子系统.

sentences.en: For flight motion simulator system, a fuzzy - PID controller based optimal frizzy reasoning method was adopted.
sentences.cn: 针对飞行仿真转台系统, 设计了模糊PID控制器,并采用了最优模糊推理这种新的模糊推理方法.

sentences.en: Frizzy - haired , friendless , neurotic a collector of comic books, Seth broke the mold on modern day protagonists.
sentences.cn: 卷发、孤僻、神经质、喜欢收集漫画, 赛思打破了现代主角的固有模式.

sentences.en: If your hair is dry, frizzy unmanageable, maybe it's just hungry!
sentences.cn: 如果您的发丝干燥鬈缩,很难梳理, 可能是因为它们需要营养大餐了!

sentences.en: No more frizzy hair Why is my hair so FRIZZY and dry, coarse or brittle?
sentences.cn: 乾燥秀发的保养法为什麽我的头发老是乾燥 、 粗糙、或是断裂?

sentences.en: Some people have naturally frizzy hair.
The splendour of her shoulders, her frizzy hair might have made him doubtful.
sentences.cn: 她两肩的华丽衣饰, 鬈缩的头发,很可能使他犹豫不决.

sentences.en: Use hand lotion to keep your hair from getting too frizzy in the heat.
sentences.cn: 将护手霜涂抹在头发上可防止其过于卷曲.

words.tran_cn: 头发卷曲的；满是卷结的
吱吱响声；卷发；皱缩（等于friz）
使鬈曲；为某人卷发；煎炸时吱吱做声

trans.tran_en: frizzy hair is very tightly curled
